name: CITY OF ALLENTOWN, Respondent, v. MSG ASSOCIATES, INC., Petitioner
name_abbreviation: City of Allentown v. MSG Associates, Inc.

parties: CITY OF ALLENTOWN, Respondent, v. MSG ASSOCIATES, INC., Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 19th day of December, 2000, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED, limited to the following issue:
Does the Allentown Business Privilege Tax Ordinance’s taxation of service-related businesses at a higher rate than sellers of goods violate the Uniformity Clause (Article VIII, Section 1) of the Pennsylvania Constitution?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
764 A.2d 1053
CITY OF ALLENTOWN, Respondent, v. MSG ASSOCIATES, INC., Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 19, 2000.
